article: a top official of the sri lankan government handling the negotiations with separatist tamil rebels for political solution to the country 's long-running ethnic conflict flew to the rebel-held north tuesday for talks .
abstract: sri lankan official goes to north for talks with tamil rebels
candidates: sri lankan government official flies to rebel-held north t tuesday for talks.
talks are aimed at finding a political solution to the country 's long-running ethnic conflict.
